grupp1.othello.model

Class GameGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • grupp1.othello.model.GameGrid

  • public class GameGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game grid. Comment: This class became redundant when game logic was moved over to the game manager class. What is left is basically a wrapper for a two- dimensional array. Still, this class will be kept in the project for it to stay true to the assignment specification. // Philip Arvidsson
    Author:
    Martin Bergqvist (S133686)
